name: WinCustomize - Dark Theme
description:
A dark theme for WinCustomize.com
Updated for the new 2K10 website.
Custom made images for Toolbar, buttons & more.
Full styling of all areas: boards, forums etc.
Textured background, transparency, Gradients, Text Glow Effects and more.
Designed to be clear, clean & easy on the eyes.
Feedback is welcome,
enjoY!
